page.title: 18TOURISM IN PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: {TOURISM Tourists have been coming through our area for years, on their way to Falmouth,Helston and other coastal resorts. Recent tourist development in our area consists of five{caravan/ {camping }sites,one of which takes {50} units{(Â£4.00).}A few people take in Summer visitors for {Bed and Breakfast accomodation{(Â£7.00).}Other people have{holiday cottages}which they let to holidaymakers throughout the Summer{(Â£200/week). } {Attractions }for the tourists include TRELISSICK with it's house, gardens, walks, restaurant, and KILLIOW, a country park with gardens, farm animals and pets.
